ygData.subject: RE: Sonorous Clouding message
ygData.msgSnippet: I had problems a long time ago as well,but recently it has been absolutely 100% reliable. The only time I EVER became visible was if I had a connection hiccup,
ygData.messageBody:
I had problems a long time ago as well,but recently it has been absolutely
100% reliable. The only time I EVER became visible was if I had a connection
hiccup, like near linkdeadness. Then I would see the icon disappear and have
about 4 seconds to start running before the smackdown started. Otherwise it
always works.

-----Original Message-----
From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 31, 1999 11:13 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Sonorous Clouding message


From: jhenders@...


On Tue, Aug 31/99, "Chris Kuenster (Entex)" <v-ntxck@...> wrote:
> From: "Chris Kuenster (Entex)" <v-ntxck@...>
>
> No I spend a huge ammount of time invisible and I have noticed the
opposite.
> I have been seen on numerous occasions where I blink into view. Its scarin
> the crap out of me. I was seen 3 times in less than an hour this morning
in
> Permafrost, fortunately I had my Jboots activated and had the speed to get
> to the zone. My skill in Wind is 200, I maxed it a few days ago. I use
invis
> to navigate all sorts of places in upper and lower Guk, and Permafrost. I
> always used to disband from my party just so I wouldnt have to worry about
> my Invis fading on me because it was always 100% reliable before this last
> patch. Now I dont know anymore, at least I know the caster Invis is going
to
> work a little while.

That's pretty odd because I have _never_ found Clouding to be 100%
reliable from the time I got it all the way to L49 (just can't be
bothered getting 50 now.) My skill has always been maxed for my level
but I still got those blink into view messages.
